original_text: As the body without the spirit is dead, so faith without deeds is dead.
korean_text: 영혼 없는 몸이 죽은 것 같이 행함이 없는 믿음은 죽은 것이니라

sentences.original_text: As the body without the spirit is dead
sentences.korean_translation: 영이 없는 몸이 죽은 것 같이

sentences.original_text: so faith without deeds is dead
